data.title: The Ghost Jazz Trio in San Diego, California
data.meta_description: Jazz Band for hire in San Diego for weddings, corporate parties, holiday parties, club venue.
data.text:
Provide your guests with the sophisticated melodies and smooth grooves of the Ghost Jazz Trio at your next corporate or private event, wedding, club venue, winery, festival or restaurant. Their seasoned musical talent, versatility, and elegant presence, will help create an unforgettable atmosphere to make your event a success. Hire 4-time nominee for best jazz album of the year, recording artist, guitarist, producer and composer James Morgan's band, Ghost Jazz Trio for your next event. The Ghost Jazz Trio is an instrumental band with the mission to enhance your your event with the cool sounds of their west coast contemporary smooth jazz grooves at reasonable rates.

Select from three packages;

Trio Package-A (guitar-bass-drums)

Quartet Package-B (added piano or sax)

Quintet Package-C (added piano and sax)

A 1000 watt two-speaker QSC PA sound system, including mixer, cords and mics, is available upon request, for speeches and band. Impress your guests with a marquee act that delivers the perfect jazz grooves to enhance your event.

Book west coast jazz at it's finest, for your corporate, private event or wedding!

The Ghost Jazz Trio is #73 in the annual year-end top 100 smooth jazz albums of 2023 at https://www.smoothjazz.com/charts/yearend

The host agrees to provide parking for all members of the band including covering all parking fees at private and public parking lots. The host agrees to provide adequate electrical, lighting, ventilation at performance location on the property. The host agrees to provide complimentary meals and beverages at events that feature food and drink for guests. No song or music genre requests will be considered or accepted by guests or hosts during the performance. The trio takes a 10 minute break every 50 minutes for events requiring two hours or more of performance.

Book Now!

Ghost Jazz Trio

Bookings are by contract, and all performance invoices are paid in full in advance.

Aggregated insurance is available upon request for properties requiring insurance coverage.

Booking Payment Policy:

Full payment required at time of booking. Accepted payment methods; PayPal, Venmo, Zelle, Square, iPayables.

No personal checks accepted.

Book Now!

After decades of leading numerous jazz fusion bands, guitarist/composer/producer James Morgan’s decision to launch his own brand of “West Coast Contemporary Jazz”, the Ghost Jazz Trio has been a spectacular success, including four 'Best Jazz Album of the Year' nominations by the San Diego Music Awards. Currently upgrading from a trio to a funky, hard-poppin’ quintet, the latest full-length jam, GROOVIN’ SMOOTH is an infectious, rhythm-centric showcase for guitarist James Morgan’s fluid style that showcases his hollow body jazz guitar, along with his prolific song writing abilities. Everything on the album is enhanced of course, by the skillful and adventurous ensemble of seasoned musicians featuring legendary guitarist (album co-writer, arranger and producer) Dean Brown (Billy Cobham, Marcus Allen, David Sanborn), bassist Nathan Brown (Bob James, Eric Marienthal, Brian Simpson), San Diego keyboardist Chase Pado and holding down the groove is San Diego's Tres Hodgens on drums. The album is engineered, edited, mastered and recorded by Grammy winner Alan Sanderson (Elton John, Michael Jackson, Rolling Stones) at his Pacific Beat Recording Studio in San Diego CA.
